issue.title: [Java] Improve error message for ListVector with wrong number of children
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15722](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15722). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a ListVector is made without any children, the error message will say "Lists have only one child. Found: []".

The wording could be improved a little to let the user know what went wrong.
